title: Civil Aviation (Designated Provincial and Strategic Airports) Regulations, 2018
content:
23rdFebruary,2018 Statutory Instruments 103
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.13 OF2018
The Civil Aviation Act, 2016
(ActNo.5of 2016)
The Civil Aviation (Designated Provincial and Strategic
Airports) Regulations, 2018
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 16 of the Civil
AviationAct,2016,thefollowingRegulationsaremade:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Civil Aviation Title
(DesignatedProvincialandStrategicAirports)Regulations,2018
2. TheairportssetoutinPartAofthe Schedulearedesignated Provincial
asprovincialairports.. airports
3. TheairportssetoutinPartBoftheSchedulearedesignated Designated
as strategic airports. strategic
airports
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
104 StatutoryInstruments 23rdFebruary,2018
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph3and5)
A. DESIGNATEDPROVINCIALAIRPORTS
Airport Province
ChinsaliAirport MuchingaProvince
Chipata Airport EasternProvince
ChomaAirport SouthernProvince
KasamaAirport NorthernProvince
Mansa Airport LuapulaProvince
MonguAirport WesternProvince
SolweziAirport North-WesternProvince
B. DESIGNATEDSTRATEGICAIRPORTS
